ingredients.ingredient: 1 pinch salt and ground black pepper to taste
1 pinch salt and ground black pepper to taste
5 ⅓ fluid ounces bourbon whiskey, divided
¼ cup non-dairy butter spread (such as I Can't Believe It's Not Butter®)

cookingTips: Place salmon and asparagus on the same baking sheet; add asparagus 5 minutes after salmon starts cooking so they finish together
Salmon is done when it reaches 145°F internally and flakes easily with a fork
Brush bourbon glaze onto salmon in the last 5 minutes of baking for maximum caramelization
enrichment.coachingPrompt: This is a complete dinner on one sheet. Are you comfortable cooking fish? I can help you determine when the salmon is perfectly cooked without drying it out.
